actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to require the vessel Sandavore to be documented as a vessel of the United States for use in the coastwise trade.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to document a certain vessel as a vessel of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to require the vessel Sandavore to be documented as a vessel of the United States for use in the coastwise trade.
